Name: [Duel] Homemade Spiked Mace
Desc: When triggering a Chain Attack, all squad members receive 1 stack of Rush, and the Stun DMG Multiplier of enemies hit is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, up to a max of <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.
Desc2: Who even cares if it's sturdy or practical? As long as it looks terrifying and painful, it's good enough!
